summary:
Nightingale Prime by: ZeroFrost reuploaded to skyrim nexus.
This is an original work of art. I\'m very grateful and honored to have been given the permission to reupload this to skyrim nexus on December 25, 2012 - Merry Christmas
descriptionHtml:
[center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Nightingale Prime HD
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][youtube]F-HFSDM-xg4[/youtube][youtube]saLAw4xBX9s[/youtube][/center]
[center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center]The Nightingale Prime HD retexture made by ZeroFrost is now back on skyrim nexus. For a long time this mod was no longer available on skyrim nexus. ZeroFrost has given me the permission to reupload his mod for that i am very greatful and honored. Now that its back everyone can enjoy this retexture once again. Even today the Nightingale Prime stands as my favorite nightingale retexture. [/center]
[center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Nightingale Prime Weapons
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center]This mod retextures your weapons to match Nightingale Prime[/center]
[center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3087[/center]
[center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Capless Nightingale & Torn Cape Nightingale
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center]The leather version of nightingale comes with the option of regular cape by default/ torn cape or capeless version these files are found in [/center][center]Data/textures/armor/nightingale/m or f/Cape Variations[/center]
[center]however the prime version does not contain those variations so if you want the prime to be capeless u must download the capless nightingale mod below[/center]
[center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1560[/center]
author: AncientVampire and ZeroFrost
